articles.content: With all the hype surrounding ChatGPT, most people are giddy with the promise of artificial intelligence, yet they are overlooking its pitfalls. If we want to have genuinely intelligent machines that… [+5364 chars]

articles.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley handing out 1,000 free Moonstones to players - TrueAchievements
articles.description: To thank everyone for their patience with Early Access, Gameloft is handing out free Moonstones to all Disney Dreamlight Valley players.
